title: When is Cassiopeia's next skin?
body:
And if there is one, make it a fun one. All of her current ones are dark/serious concepts. 

Thanks so much, she deserves a new one already. Screw Zac. 8)

replies.body: Zac should def get a new skin first, but after Zac and before Cass should be Zyra, she really needs some love
Zac should have received a chroma pack in my book. At least he would have gotten some attention.

Yeah this seems kind of like an oversight in my book, but I think Riot said at some point the reason they didn't give a chroma pack was because they do have something in the works for him and they want his next skin to really be amazing
That makes no sense, that's kinda like saying "I'm not going to give you lunch because I want dinner to be the best thing you ever had."
